mn84:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma mahakaccano madhurayam viharati gundavane.
mn84:2.2: “samano khalu, bho, kaccano madhurayam viharati gundavane.
mn84:2.3: Tam kho pana bhavantam kaccanam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn84:2.4: ‘pandito viyatto medhavi bahussuto cittakathi kalyanapatibhano vuddho ceva araha ca’.
mn84:2.5: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
mn84:3.1: Atha kho raja madhuro avantiputto bhadrani bhadrani yanani yojapetva bhadram yanam abhiruhitva bhadrehi bhadrehi yanehi madhuraya niyyasi mahaccarajanubhavena ayasmantam mahakaccanam dassanaya.
mn84:3.2: Yavatika yanassa bhumi yanena gantva yana paccorohitva pattikova yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakaccanena saddhim sammodi. Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho raja madhuro avantiputto ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
mn84:4.3: brahmanova sukko vanno, kanho anno vanno;
mn84:4.5: brahmanava brahmuno putta orasa mukhato jata brahmaja brahmanimmita brahmadayada’ti.
mn84:5.3: brahmanova sukko vanno, kanho anno vanno;

mn84:5.44: yadi evam sante, ime cattaro vanna samasama honti no va?
mn84:5.46: “Addha kho, bho kaccana, evam sante, ime cattaro vanna samasama honti.

mn84:6.2: idhassa khattiyo panatipati adinnadayi kamesumicchacari musavadi pisunavaco pharusavaco samphappalapi abhijjhalu byapannacitto micchaditthi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya no va?

mn84:8.4: Imassa yam icchasi tam dandam panehi’ti.

mn84:10.1: Evam vutte, raja madhuro avantiputto ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
mn84:10.3: Seyyathapi, bho kaccana, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota kaccanena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
mn84:10.4: Esaham bhavantam kaccanam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn84:10.5: Upasakam mam bhavam kaccano dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
mn84:10.6: “Ma kho mam tvam, maharaja, saranam agamasi.
mn84:10.7: Tameva tvam bhagavantam saranam gaccha yamaham saranam gato”ti.
mn84:10.8: “Kaham pana, bho kaccana, etarahi so bhagava viharati araham sammasambuddho”ti?
mn84:10.9: “Parinibbuto kho, maharaja, etarahi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho”ti.
mn84:11.1: “Sacepi mayam, bho kaccana, suneyyama tam bhagavantam dasasu yojanesu, dasapi mayam yojanani gaccheyyama tam bhagavantam dassanaya arahantam sammasambuddham.
mn84:11.2: Sacepi mayam, bho kaccana, suneyyama tam bhagavantam visatiya yojanesu, timsaya yojanesu, cattarisaya yojanesu, pannasaya yojanesu, pannasampi mayam yojanani gaccheyyama tam bhagavantam dassanaya arahantam sammasambuddham.
mn84:11.3: Yojanasate cepi mayam bho kaccana, suneyyama tam bhagavantam, yojanasatampi mayam gaccheyyama tam bhagavantam dassanaya arahantam sammasambuddham.
mn84:11.4: Yato ca, bho kaccana, parinibbuto so bhagava, parinibbutampi mayam bhagavantam saranam gacchama dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn84:11.5: Upasakam mam bhavam kaccano dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
